title: 11.) Top 40 Countdown - My Baby Brother Makes Me Mad!
description:
4-year-old Riggins and his mom call Dr. Laura to discuss his pushing and shoving of his 2-year-old brother. - Dr. Laura: "Use your words, not your hands, to get attention."
